long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you a NetSuite user who speaks Arabic? If so, our extension is just what you need! Our extension seamlessly integrates with NetSuite, providing a complete Arabic localization experience for all NetSuite modules. With our extension, you can enjoy a fully translated user interface, including all menus, buttons, and dialogs. Plus, our extension is easy to install and use – simply add it to your Chrome browser and log in to NetSuite as usual. Say goodbye to language barriers and start using NetSuite in Arabic today!

Note: To enable this extension please contact ITplicity company administrator
